name: Maybe (Sessions at AOL)
content: 我是强壮的，但是我在变弱
And I make plenty of mistakes
And life with me is never easy
I'm jaded but oh so lovely
尽管我很疲倦，但是它又是如此动人
All you have to do is hold me
Just how sweet it can be
When we're at the same place
When we're on the same road
When it's okay to hold my hand
When it's just because you love me
当这一切只是因为你爱我
You let me  you need me
All you have to do is hold me
我很有可能永远不会将它全部解决
But what I know is I wasn't meant
但我知道的是我没有打算
To walk this world without you
离开你，去走遍这个世界
Yeah I'm gonna try to give you
你双眼忽略的每一个细节
我们还会相见，你会需要我的
Oh yeah maybe you'll love me
I don't want to be tough
And I don't want to be proud
我不需要被确定下来，我当然
I just need to be loved
I just want to be loved by you and I
我仅仅是想要得到你的爱
我不会停止，因为我相信
